channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AZ

item.title: Report X-2023080568
item.description:
Report X-2023080568

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-31
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was coming out of the trailer during the unload process when it was observed that the side and part of the bottom of the box was wet and had a strong odor. The package was then placed in a hazmat bag lined tote and taken to QA for processing DescribePack: The top of one of the bottles came loose during the shipping process DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The top was tightened down

item.title: Report X-2023080515
item.description:
Report X-2023080515

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-29
  • City: CHANDLER
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was placed at horseshoe and its presence notified to QA; placed in hazmat tote. DescribePack: Package failed at cap of one container, which soiled entire side of box inside and outside. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in hazmat tote, assessed for ISF, DPR, and HESS, and placed in hazmat cage vent to stop any possible fumes.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found in the unload where it was placed into a hazmat bag and taken to the QA hut to be processed. DescribePack: One of the paints can had a loose lid on top. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Hazmat bag was placed into a white pail and placed into the hazmat cage waiting for disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023080301
item.description:
Report X-2023080301

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-21
  • City: CHANDLER
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded which was then noticed as soiled. The package was placed in the Hazmat cage in a red hazardous tote and hazardous tote bag. DescribePack: The damage to the bottle indicates it was dropped because the base of the neck has some dented plastic. DurationRel: 38 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a bag and tote in the hazmat cage to be inspected. package was placed in upright position.

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I had went to the hut and randomly, I saw a hazmat that was destroyed and needed to be processed right away. DescribePack: 2 bottles out of 4 had a missing cap which caused the liquid to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: I had placed a hazmat bag into the yellow drum and placed it into the hazmat cage awaiting the disposition.

  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one of the poly 60 pound pail of accutab si (un2880)had been damaged and had released 25 pounds of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023080255
item.description:
Report X-2023080255

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-22T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WHEN THIS PACKAGE STARTED LEAKING, I WAS CALLED TO THE AREA I TOLD THE PACKAGE HANDLERS TO STOP WORKING IN THE AREA UNTILL, I CLEANED IT UP. DescribePack: ALL CANS WERE DENTED I FOUND PUNCTURE HOLS OM THE SIDE OF THE CAN ABOUT THE SIZE OF A PEN HEAD DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: I CLEAND UP WHAT LEAKED OUT I PLACED THE DAMAGED CANS IN A TOTE TO PREVENT ANY OTHER PACKAGES FROM BEING CONTAMINATED.
